H0.text: Moth is an organism in which cell walls can be found.

H1.text: Grass is an organism in which cell walls can be found.

H2.text: Snake is an organism in which cell walls can be found.

H3.text: Hawk is an organism in which cell walls can be found.

A4.text: In land plants, the primary cell wall comprises polysaccharides like cellulose, hemicelluloses, and pectin.

A5.text: absent from animals and many other taxa.
